articles.author: Jasper Jolly
articles.title: Pyrex and Instant Pot maker files for bankruptcy protection in US - The Guardian
articles.description: Instant Brands, which blames rising interest rates for financial problems, will continue to serve retailers
articles.content:
The maker of Pyrex kitchenware and the Instant Pot pressure cooker has filed for bankruptcy protection, blaming rising interest rates for its financial difficulties.
Instant Brands, controlled by th… [+8020 chars]

articles.title: Dylan Mulvaney: Bud Light loses top spot in US after boycott - BBC
articles.description: Some drinkers boycotted the brand after the firm partnered with transgender influencer Dylan Mulvaney.
articles.content:
Bud Light has lost its position as the best-selling beer in the US after facing a boycott, new figures show.
